statements: SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 123
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE mileage_since_last_maintenance > 5000
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_maintenance_due_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_due_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE mileage_since_last_maintenance BETWEEN 3000 AND 10000
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE mileage_since_last_maintenance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-01-01' AND next_maintenance_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_due_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(mileage_since_last_maintenance) AS average_mileage FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Car' AND last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change');
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) as num_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, maintenance_schedule.maintenance_date FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_schedule ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance_schedule.maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation' ORDER BY maintenance_schedule.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM VehicleData;
SELECT vehicle_id, total_mileage FROM VehicleData;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleData ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleData WHERE total_mileage > 50000;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM VehicleData ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, total_hours_used FROM VehicleData WHERE total_hours_used > 1000 ORDER BY total_hours_used ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, year FROM Vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS num_vehicles FROM Vehicles GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE repair_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM Vehicles JOIN UsageData ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = UsageData.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer FROM Vehicles WHERE manufacturer='Toyota' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN Vehicles ON MaintenanceLogs.vehicle_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE repair_type='Oil Change' AND year < 2010;
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM Vehicles JOIN UsageData ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = UsageData.vehicle_id WHERE UsageData.mileage > 50000 ORDER BY mileage DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, scheduled_date FROM Vehicles JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = MaintenanceSchedule.vehicle_id WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_model, manufacturer FROM vehicles ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT maintenance_type, cost, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(distance_traveled) AS max_distance FROM usage_data GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_model, manufacturer, manufacture_year FROM vehicles WHERE manufacture_year > 2010 ORDER BY manufacture_year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost FROM maintenance_logs WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT v.vehicle_model, ms.maintenance_type, ms.frequency FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON v.vehicle_id = ms.schedule_id WHERE ms.frequency = 3;
SELECT v.vehicle_model, u.distance_traveled, u.fuel_consumed, u.date FROM vehicles v JOIN usage_data u ON v.vehicle_id = u.vehicle_id WHERE u.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
